feels.name: Curiosity
feels.quote: Chief among these motives was the overwhelming idea of the great whale himself. Such a portentous and mysterious monster roused all my curiosity.

causedByEvent.name: Encounter with the idea of the great whale

feels.name: Wonder
feels.quote: But what most puzzled and confounded you was a long, limber, portentous, black mass of something hovering in the centre of the picture over three blue, dim, perpendicular lines floating in a nameless yeast.
